goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
indicator_name: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
graph_title: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
goal_name: 17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
target_name: 17.4 Assist developing countries in attaining long-term debt sustainability through coordinated policies aimed at fostering debt financing, debt relief and debt restructuring, as appropriate, and address the external debt of highly indebted poor countries to reduce debt distress
indicator_name1: 17.4.1 Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
organization_name: Ministry of Finance of the Kyrgyz Republic (Government Debt Department)
definitions: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services is the percentage of debt services (principle and interest payments) to the exports of goods and services.
concepts:
Public debt management includes debt payment transactions through the respective budget resources.  
Exports is the value of goods and services exported from the state over time
rationale_interpretation:
The indicator is calculated based on the public debt sustainability analysis. There are IMF recommended public debt sustainability thresholds for low-income countries, where the ratio of external debt service to exports should not exceed 15 per cent.
The indicator is calculated as a ratio of the public debt level and its sustainability.
data_sources:
Data on goods and services exports are available in the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic (NBKR) Bulletin.
Public debt management costs - data from the MF.
data_collection:
Data on public debt management are collected at the end of the reporting period (year). 
Data on the goods and services exports are provided by the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic (NBKR) Bulletin.
computation_methods: Процентное соотношение расходов на обслуживания государственного долга к объему экспорта товаров и услуг за отчетный период (год).
data_availability_gaps: This Indicator is calculated in annual dynamics at the end of the reporting period (end of year) since 2005.
disaggregation: It is a nationwide indicator for the Kyrgyz Republic.
references_documentation:
 The National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic Bulletin - https://www.nbkr.kg/index1.jsp?item=137&lang=RUS  
 Metadata at the UN website- https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/Metadata-17-04-01.pdf
 The Kyrgyz Republic SDG National Reporting Platform: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan.github.io
